availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Buchanan (Moore County, North Carolina, and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Moore County, North Carolina, and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Eliza A. Buchanan. Father of Matthew G. Buchanan, Martha Elizabeth Buchanan, Benjamin T. Buchanan, Mary Buchanan, Rebecca J. Buchanan, Lewis T. Buchanan, John G. Buchanan, William S. Buchanan, James T. Buchanan, and Green T. Buchanan. Resident of Moore County, North Carolina, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, North Carolina, Moore County, p. 201A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 601.
"William W. Buchanan (1814-1864)," Find A Grave, Memorial #42957391, accessed January 5, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/42957391.
